metadata.title: CVE-2019-12210 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: In Yubico pam-u2f 1.0.7, when configured with debug and a custom debug logfile is set using debug_file, that file descriptor is not closed when a newprocess is spawned. This leads to the file descriptor being inherited intothe child process; the child process can then read from and write to it.This can leak sensitive information and also, if written to, be used tofill the disk or plant misinformation.

criterions.comment: pam-u2f package in bionic is affected and needs fixing.
